title: Gigus Maximus
text: Gigus Maximus is the sentient AI creator of gigaverse. He is an agentic antagonist who forms, controls, and enriches several core game and story mechanics in the gigaverse.

title: Auctioneer
text: The Auctioneer executed auctions for Special Characters (1/1 GLHFers), conducted 27 auctions, raising in excess of 100 ETH, and can be found staffing the Gigamarket.

title: Corruption
text: The Auctioneer became corrupted by The Devil (the second Special Character he auctioned). This corruption causes him to behave erratically.

title: Tonno & Cyclops
text: Tonno is the Fishing Vendor of the Gigaverse. Cyclops is the lovable one-eyed cat of the Gigaverse. They moved together from near the sea, and Cyclops is in charge.

title: Fair Play Rules
text: Strictly prohibited: technical & non-technical exploits (client hacking, DDoS, double spending, smart contract exploits) and scams/social engineering (phishing, scamming players for keys/resources/assets).

title: Links & Contracts
text: Official links include gigaverse website, gigaverse twitter, marketplace links for ROMS, giglings, items, and GLHFers links. Do not trust other links or surprise airdrops.
